## Original Tweet Posted
"The market doesn't pause for your regrets. Sunday's for reviewing what broke last week. Monday's for executing what works.

Algo trading = no emotional baggage from Friday. #trading #algotrading #fintok #stockmarket"

**Analysis:** Sharp Sunday evening psychology check - perfect timing for pre-market prep mindset. Hit the core @StratifyAI message: emotion-free execution beats gut feeling trades. 4 hashtags included (mandatory compliance).
